title: President Clinton and the AFDC Grant

content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the type of grant that the new welfare program created by the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Act uses and explain how it affects the relationship between the states and the federal government. Explain why states might prefer the type of funding provided by TANF rather than by previous programs. Describe the constitutional principle that supports the interaction between the federal government and the state governments in this situation, and explain how it relates to the scenario.
